title: Yuga Labs' Otherside Action Game Series, Project Dragon, Begins on July 27th!
description: Get ready for guns, mayhem, and jank because, on July 27th, the Yugaverse will be heading to the streets of Meetropolis for the premiere of Yuga Labs’ Project Dragon game!This is not an elaborate nut joke! On Thursday, Yuga Labs announced that its highly anticipated Otherside action game, Project Dragon, will debut on Saturday, July 27th, at 12 P.M. EST!“Project Dragon July 27th, 2024 Noon ET, Yuga Labs tweeted from its Otherside account. “Meebits, Voyagers, Kodas, BAYC, MAYC, BAKC, Grailed, Moo
